sense.def:
The claws of a bird or animal
so ozki, zakrivljeni nohti na nogah ptice ali kakšne druge živali.

The claws of a lobster, crab, or scorpion
sta koničasta dela na koncu nog pri jastogih, rakih ali škorpijonih, s katerimi prijemajo predmete.

Kadar neka žival
claws something
, tisto opraska ali poškoduje s kremplji ali kleščami.

seg.quote: He had been clawed by the cat.

sense.def:
To claw at something
pomeni poskusiti nekaj poškodovati ali prijeti z nohti ali prsti.

seg.quote: I fought and clawed and bit and kicked.
...scrabbling and clawing at the rock as I fell.
